# [Interview #1086: WoR Signing Report - Talenelat, Entry #21](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1086#21)

#### Leinton

To the spren, is becoming mindless the same as death?

#### Brandon Sanderson

They consider it as such.
